languages.text: "Золото Трона, я и забыл, как весело бывает с несанкционированными псайкерами!" {n}Винтерскейл довольно улыбается, словно редкое сокровище само прыгнуло ему в руки.{/n} "Как понимаю, это прощальный подарок тебе, {name}. Хотел{mf||а} жутких историй про гемункула? Пожалуйста — ступай в Гиблые земли!"

traits.locale_text: "Золото Трона, я и забыл, как весело бывает с несанкционированными псайкерами!" {n}Винтерскейл довольно улыбается, словно редкое сокровище само прыгнуло ему в руки.{/n} "Как понимаю, это прощальный подарок тебе, {name}. Хотел{mf||а} жутких историй про гемункула? Пожалуйста — ступай в Гиблые земли!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"
languages.original_text: "Золото Трона, я и забыл, как весело бывает с несанкционированными псайкерами!" {n}Винтерскейл довольно улыбается, словно редкое сокровище само прыгнуло ему в руки.{/n} "Как понимаю, это прощальный подарок тебе, {name}. Хотел{mf||а} жутких историй про гемункула? Пожалуйста — ступай в Гиблые земли!"

traits.locale_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much fun you can have with an illegal psyker! {n}Winterscale smiles, pleased. as if a rare treasure ended up jumping into his hands all by itself.{/n} "I understand this as my parting gift for you, {name}. You want some Haemonculus horror stories? There are aplenty — just go into the Deadlands!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much fun you can have with an illegal psyker! {n}Winterscale smiles, pleased. as if a rare treasure ended up jumping into his hands all by itself.{/n} "I understand this as my parting gift for you, {name}. You want some Haemonculus horror stories? There are aplenty — just go into the Deadlands!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

Do you want some Haemonculus horror stories? There are aplenty — just go into the Deadlands!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much fun you can have with an illegal psyker! {n}Winterscale smiles, pleased. as if a rare treasure ended up jumping into his hands all by itself.{/n} "I understand this as my parting gift for you, {name}. Do you want some Haemonculus horror stories? There are aplenty — just go into the Deadlands!"

traits.locale_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «¡Por el oro del Trono, había olvidado lo divertidos que eran los psíquicos no autorizados!» {n}Winterscale sonríe complacido, como si un raro tesoro hubiese caído en sus manos de manera fortuita.{/n} «Considere esto mi regalo de despedida, {name}. ¿Busca historias de terror sobre el Hemónculo? ¡Basta con adentrarse en las Tierras Muertas!».
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el oro del Trono, había olvidado lo divertidos que eran los psíquicos no autorizados! {n}Winterscale sonríe complacido, como si un raro tesoro hubiese caído en sus manos de manera fortuita.{/n} «Consideraré esto como mi regalo de despedida para usted, {name}. ¿Busca historias de terror sobre Hemónculos? Las hay de sobra; ¡basta con adentrarse en las Tierras Muertas!».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “黄金王座在上啊，我都忘了和非法灵能者聊天能有多让人激动了！”{n}温特斯凯尔满意地微笑起来，仿佛看到一件稀世珍宝蹦到了他手里一样。{/n}“就把这当作我给你的离别礼物吧，{name}。你想听听关于血伶人的恐怖故事吗？那就去死亡之地吧！”
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上啊，我都忘了和非法灵能者聊天能有多开心了！”{n}温特斯凯尔满意地为笑起来，仿佛看到一件稀世珍宝蹦到了他手里一样。{/n}“就把这当作我给你的离别礼物吧，{name}。你想听听关于血伶人的恐怖故事吗？去死亡之地吧！那里有很多这样的故事！”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Par le Trône, j'avais oublié à quel point les psykers non assermentés peuvent être passionnants ! » {n}Winterscale sourit, aussi satisfait que si un trésor rare venait de lui tomber entre les mains.{/n} « Ce sera mon cadeau d'adieu pour vous, {name}. Vous cherchez des histoires horribles sur un hémoncule ? Il vous suffit de vous rendre dans les Terres mortes ! »
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône, j'avais oublié à quel point les psykers hors-la-loi peuvent être divertissants ! » {n}Winterscale sourit, aussi satisfait que si un trésor rare venait de lui tomber entre les mains.{/n} « D'ailleurs, ce sera mon cadeau d'adieu pour vous, {name}. Vous cherchez des histoires horribles sur un hémoncule ? Il vous suffit de vous rendre dans les Terres mortes pour trouver votre bonheur ! »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「やれやれ、非認可の異能者を相手にした時の楽しみを忘れていた！」{n}ウィンタースケールは嬉しそうに微笑んだ。まるで希少な宝物が、自ら己の手の中に飛び込んできたかのようだった。{/n}「これはお前への餞別だろ、{name}？ハモンキュラスの恐ろしい物語を識りたいのか？たっぷりとあるさ…死の大地へ行けばな！」
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"

traits.locale_text: 「やれやれ、非認可の異能者を相手にした時の楽しみを忘れていた！」{n}ウィンタースケールは嬉しそうに微笑んだ。まるで希少な宝物が、自ら己の手の中に飛び込んできたかのようだった。{/n}「これはお前への餞別だろ、{name}？ハモンキュラスの恐ろしい物語を識りたいのか？たっぷりとあるさ…死の大地へ行けばな！」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Beim Gold des Throns, ich habe ganz vergessen, wie viel Spaß man mit einem illegalen Psioniker haben kann!", {n}grinst Winterzunder zufrieden, als wäre ihm ein seltener Schatz von ganz allein in die Hände gesprungen.{/n} "Nennen wir es mein Abschiedsgeschenk an Euch, {name}. Ihr wolltet Horrorgeschichten über den Haemonculus hören? Dann ab in die Todlande mit Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"

traits.locale_text: "Beim Gold des Throns, ich habe ganz vergessen, wie viel Spaß man mit einem illegalen Psioniker haben kann!"{n}, grinst Winterzunder zufrieden, als wäre ihm ein seltener Schatz von ganz allein in die Hände gesprungen.{/n} "Ich werte das als mein Abschiedsgeschenk an Euch, {name}. Wollt Ihr ein paar Haemonculus-Gruselgeschichten hören? Es gibt reichlich — geht nur bloß nicht in die Todlande!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Tahtı kaplayan altın adına, onaysız bir ruhsezerle ne kadar heyecan yaşayabileceğini unutmuşum." {n}Winterscale, aniden avuçlarının içinde nadir bir hazine belirmişçesine memnun bir hâlde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bu da benim sana veda hediyem olsun {name}. Haimonkulus'u anlatan korku hikâyeleri mi istemiştin? O zaman sana Ölü Diyarlar yolu görünüyor!"
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold, I forgot how much excitement you can have with an unsanctioned psyker!" {n}Winterscale smiles, as pleased as if a rare treasure had jumped into his hands all by itself.{/n} "Let's call this my parting gift to you, {name}. You wanted horror stories about the Haemonculus? Then it's off to the Deadlands for you!"
